summary: A mod that aims to make Morthal a better and bigger place
descriptionHtml:
WORK IN PROGRES 


This mod aims to make Morthal a better and bigger place by adding more houses and walkways. at the moment it only add a few houses and some more aesthetics hopefully this mod will make Morthal a better place to visit. 

MODS THAT ARE NOT COMPATIBLE 
MORTHAL- A TRUE HOLD 
If you know if any mods that might not be compatible then please tell me.

1.1 adds sum steps up to sum of the buildings. and a new blacksmith area but no blacksmith as of yet

In the future I will add interiors E.G. shops, npc houses and maybe a player home, I will also add more NPCs to the city. 

please tell me about any bugs.
author: ElrosCalaelen
